-- | Convert strings into hexadecimal and back.
--   
--   Convert strings into hexadecimal and back.
@package hex
@version 0.1.2


-- | Convert strings into hexadecimal and back.
module Data.Hex

-- | Convert strings into hexadecimal and back.
class Hex t
hex :: Hex t => t -> t
unhex :: (Hex t, Monad m) => t -> m t
instance Hex ByteString
instance Hex ByteString
instance Hex String
